flavorText: "It's only the end if we allow it."

foreignData.flavorText: „Das Ende ist es nur, wenn wir aufgeben."

foreignData.flavorText: "Solo es el fin si permitimos que así sea".

foreignData.flavorText: « Ce ne sera la fin que si nous ne faisons rien. »

{T}, surmenez le Ritualiste de l'oasis : Ajoutez deux manas d'une seule couleur de votre choix à votre réserve. (Une créature surmenée ne se dégage pas pendant votre prochaine étape de dégagement.)

foreignData.flavorText: "È la fine solo se permettiamo che lo sia."

{T}, Strema il Ritualista dell'Oasi: Aggiungi due mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana. (Una creatura stremata non STAPpa durante il tuo prossimo STAP.)

foreignData.name: オアシスの祭儀師

{T}, オアシスの祭儀師を督励する：あなたのマナ・プールに、好きな色１色のマナ２点を加える。（督励されたクリーチャーは、あなたの次のアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ナーガ・ドルイド

foreignData.name: 오아시스 의식주의자
foreignData.text:
{T}: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{T}, 오아시스 의식주의자를 분전시킨다: 원하는 한 가지 색의 마나 두 개를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다. (분전한 생물은 당신의 다음 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Só é o fim se o permitirmos."

{T}, exaura Ritualista do Oásis: Adicione dois manas de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana. (Uma criatura exaurida não será desvirada durante sua próxima etapa de desvirar.)

{T}，耗竭綠洲儀式師：加兩點任意顏色的單色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。（已耗竭的生物於你的下一個重置步驟中不能重置。）

name: Oasis Ritualist
originalText:
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{T}, Exert Oasis Ritualist: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

rulings.text: You can’t exert a creature unless an effect allows you to do so. Similar effects that “tap and freeze” a creature (such as that of Decision Paralysis) don’t exert that creature.

If an exerted creature is already untapped during your next untap step (most likely because it had vigilance or an effect untapped it), exert’s effect preventing it from untapping expires without having done anything.
If you gain control of another player’s creature until end of turn and exert it, it will untap during that player’s untap step.

Some cards in the Hour of Devastation set let you exert a creature as a cost to activate one of its abilities. You can exert it to pay that cost even if you’ve already exerted it earlier in the turn. Exerting it multiple times will keep it tapped only during your next untap step.

text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}, Exert Oasis Ritualist: Add two mana of any one color. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)
